findings.title: cluster-admin role granted to Group
findings.description: Group "system:masters" has cluster-admin privileges (full cluster access)
findings.recommendation: Use least-privilege RBAC - grant only necessary permissions
findings.remediation: Create a custom role with specific permissions instead of cluster-admin
